workshoptitle: DBA Essentials - Configure Network Environment for Oracle Database 21c

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: The workshop on network environment for Oracle Database 21c which includes listener configuration, listener operations, and HTTPS ports for Container Database (CDB) and Pluggable Database (PDB).

tutorials.title: Lab 2: HTTPS Port for CDB and PDB
tutorials.description: How to view and set the HTTPS port number for both Container Database (CDB) and Pluggable Database (PDB).

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Listener Operations
tutorials.description: How to perform listener operations, such as starting and stopping the listener, checking the listener status, and so on, using the listener control utility.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
